summary: One, two, three, sun is the story of Victorine ( Anouk Grinberg ) who grew up in the suburbs of Marseille, stifled by her mother ( Myriam Boyer ) and caught between the urge to grow up and ... See full summary »

title: Un, deux, trois, soleil
